title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.3 - Equipment not weighed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.3 - Equipment not weighed

State Regulations

No whip or substitute for a whip, blinkers or number
cloth shall be allowed on the scales nor shall any bridle, safety vest or
safety helmet approved by the stewards be weighed. A safety vest shall weigh no
more than two pounds and shall be designed to provide shock absorbing
protection to the upper body, as evidenced by a label with at least a rating of
five, by the British Equestrian Trade Association (BETA). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4225.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
